p: Tissues (brains and hearts) were thawed and weighed prior to homogenization in a TissueLyser II mixer (2 minutes at 30 cycles/s; Qiagen, Germany) in 0.75 ml EMEM. Resulting homogenates were clarified by centrifugation (12,000 rpm for 5 minutes) and stored at -80Â°C. Viral RNA from the processed tissues, as well as from oropharyngeal and cloacal swabs and feather pulps, was extracted using a QIAcube extractor (Qiagen, Germany) according to the instructions provided by the manufacturer.
